My tumor markers have been steadily increasing since June of last year but scans do not show new growths, apart for the liver mets I was diagnosed with in early 2010. In fact, the latest CT scan shows that my liver mets have not undergone any change, apart from an observation by one of the radiologists that my liver mets appear to be undergoing necrosis.
